The Data Model

The

class cube.models.components.Component(*args, **kwargs)

A third party FOSS Component.

Variables

  • name – (String) Name of the FOSS component Unique.

  • package_repo – (String) repository of the package

  • description – (String) Descritpion of the FOSS component

  • programming_language – (String) Name of programming languages used in this Component

  • spdx_expression – (String) An expression of license for the component.

  • homepage_url – (URL) Url of the repository of the component

  • export_control_status – (String) A string specifying the export control status

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
class cube.models.components.Usage(*args, **kwargs)

Qualifies how a Version of a component is used in a Release of a Product.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
class cube.models.components.Version(*args, **kwargs)

A specific version of a third party component

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
class cube.models.licenses.License(*args, **kwargs)

A license identified by its SPDX id.

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
